long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension let's users pick a color code by clicking on the extension and then hovering over the color code they want to copy. By clicking on the color, the color code will be automatically copied to their board and the can simple paste the code wherever they want.
